item.title: Pre-JAGEX Software RSC client , build 39
item.dc:creator: @Old_Rsc_Player Old Rsc Player
item.description:
@Old_Rsc_Player wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:30, topic:308310”][quote author=Old Rsc Player link=topic=404552.msg2995639#msg2995639 date=1255564967]

Devious MUD was never hosted by jagex so it will be impossible to get i believe.

andrew has said that Devious MUD was just a technical test he did before rsc it was never hosted, and its prob been dead ever since.

and jagex will prob never release it if they still have it.

DeviousMud was hosted for a couple weeks, If you could get a hold of lightning or Rab then there the only 2 I could think of that would have it. DeviousMud was also released, I remember this and more then a handful of people got it. It would be EXTREMELY Rare. Im sure its burried now.

Edit: Yes they still have it, andrew is making a video of it and putting it on youtube. I read this on there forums
[/quote]

link to the post where he said that[/quote]

http://forum.runescape.com/l=0/forums.ws?13,14,692,59515385

Boboyobo asks:
Do ya’ll still have devious mud somewhere?

Yes, I still have it; it still runs. Not anything like finished enough to put on our website, but, one day, I really should post a YouTube video of it running.

He stated ideas about a youtube video multiple times, im not going to find all the links.

Read full topic
